data.title: Great group birthday dinner celebration
data.text: The group could not have chosen a better place. Beginning with free valet parking and coat check up to the table set up and service and food, I can not imagine a better experience. I highly recommend this place. I have not tasted a better Kale Salad any where else. We had a group of ten people and we ordered different items, and everyone was very complimentary. At the end the Chef came out and talked to us. Great!

data.title: Birthday Dinners
data.text: Decided to try Gaucho Grill for my oldest and youngest birthdays. Both are born in August. Brought along their Grandmother. We all had a great time. Thx

data.title: Great service ! Great food!
data.text: The valet welcomed us right away( parking is a pain around here so that's a plus). The hostess greeted us right away and sat us down. Our waitress was sweet, attentive and gave great suggestions. The food is simply delicious!  My fish was cooked to perfection, flavorful and a good quality piece. The atmosphere and decor is very nice.  The tres leches was yummy!

data.title: The place is great
data.text: Let's start with the appetizers get the grilled octopus and the figs dishes tremendous flavor. Salads great. Dinner great. I would go here a million times. The restaurant is decorated very well the wait staff is proffesional and the food is great what more could you want.

data.title: Great Steak!!!
data.text: We went there for a family event and the food was great plus the serving staff were polite and courteous.

data.title: Great apps
data.text: Great appetizers. Quick service, fresh food.  I wasn't all that impressed with main course.  We' definitely go back, but we will go heavy on the appetizers and drinks and call it a night.....

data.title: Brunch Beauty
data.text: Gauchos is the best place around for Sunday brunch. Nice selection and beautiful atmosphere. You won't be sorry.

data.title: Service, oh yes!!!
data.text: A favorite restaurant of my parents. The menu is Argentine Steakhouse but the food is served with a twist. Great selection of mojitos that are fresh and moderately large. As for the food, it was very good. I had a octopus starter that was tender and flavorful, perfect! Then a main course of seafood paella that was good but could have used a bit more spice.

data.title: Great service with great food
data.text: We went there after a business meeting, and had a very enjoyable and nice evening.  The food was great and the atmosphere was relax yet sophisticated.  The services from all staff member were very good too.  I took a call at the outside patio during dinner (!), and one of the server brought a glass of water for me without asking and continued to check on me during my call, great services.  Food was very good too!

data.title: Saturday night magic
data.text: Very good argentine style food.  A great paella and a Delish wedge salad.  Service is great and they really aim to please.  Worth a visit and a good value too.

data.title: Tapas hour special
data.text:
Enjoyed the special hour for tapas at the bar. Always great to try new things.
Their Torre di Pizza just delicious.. staff  super nice..

data.title: Excellent food and service!
data.text:
The best steak in years, fantastic! Very good and friendly service, nice choice of wines, reasonable price on all dishes as well as beverages. We where 10 hungry guests that was served delicious food on warm plates without anyone being mistreated or disappointed.
The menu is very good it both fish, meat, chicken and vegetarian, excellent choices to be made!
My best recommendations!

data.title: Food better than the service
data.text: From the initial phone contact making a reservation for 11, I was impressed with the customer service.  They were professional and accommodating. Unfortunately, I don't think the wait demonstrated the same level of professionalism or attention.  One server seemed oblivious that he spilled water all over a gift that was wrapped in tissue paper...the paper had to be removed immediately to ensure the gift wasn't destroyed.  However, the food, a bit overpriced, was very good and I think everyone in our party enjoyed their meal.

data.title: Great Great Spot
data.text: Went here for my girlfriends 39th birthday and the meal was great ! I had a cake sent to the restaurant from her favorite bakery the restaurant was great with accommodating this request. Overall just a very pleasant experience with a great meal!

data.title: trendy
data.text: awesome atmosphere, great food and service. a must. added plus valet parking. we frequent once a week

data.title: Perfect Sunday Brunch
data.text: This was my third visit to Gaucho Grill and as always it was a delicious and delightful experience. The regular lunch and dinner menus are quite nice (I visited the first time between the two services), but I love the Sunday Brunch the best. An array of breakfast through dinner selections with tempting desserts and a complimentary cocktail make it the perfect place on a lazy Sunday morning. There are dishes to suit every palate and mood. Steak, fish, chicken; pancakes, omlettes, stuffed french toast; the best bacon I have ever tasted and homemade breads. This is the hang over cure and a great place to while away a lazy Sunday. The atmosphere is always beautiful with impeccable service, and surprisingly in contrast with the luxurious appointments, the prices are reasonable. The owners of the restaurant are almost always in attendence to ensure just so service and they are painstakingly attentive with the smallest of details.

data.title: Beautiful ambiance but not  great food
data.text: My son chose this restaurant for a family birthday dinner. Very pretty  place and valet parking was a good start.  Appetizers were ok  ( mussels, eggplant rollatini, figs and chorizo) Unfortunately  most of the main dishes were very disappointing. We had   2 orders of seafood paella , which was not good. Shrimps were tiny and  tasted like they came out of a can. Chicken tasted like boiled chicken, lobster was tasteless as was the saffron rice.  We had two  orders of steak. (Filet and strip ) The strip steak was tough.  The lobster ravioli was the best main dish we had . Pork chops were ok.  Desserts (cheesecake and crepes) also disappointing.  If we were eating in an inexpensive diner, it all would have been acceptable, but for those prices, it was not!!!!

data.title: Amazing Food!
data.text: This is probably my most favorite, "fancy" restaurant in White Plains.  I go out to dinner in the area quite frequently and this has becoming my go to spot.  The food especially the steak are delicious and the tres leches...oh my.  Staff is quite friendly as well.

data.title: Stick with the steak
data.text: Went for dinner with a party of 8 , appetizers were very good , drinks were "EH" and the service was nothing special, waiter got at least three of the orders wrong and told one of our party that he could not serve rice with a particular dish , when he could have very easily have served it as a slide,  when your paying $50 dollars an entree give the customer what he or she wants, the steak was very good but the seafood dishes were bland and had no taste except for the crab cake appetizer

data.title: Business Dinner
data.text: We had a business dinner of about 20 people. The service was a bit slow but the food was really good. I had the skirt steak which was cooked perfectly. Others had the chicken and sole. Those who had the fish stated it was really good.
